CustomField.formula: IF( Renewal__c=FALSE && TODAY() >= DATE((Year(TODAY())),7,1) || TODAY() <= DATE((Year(TODAY())),4,30),"1", /* Today Only*/ IF( Renewal__c=FALSE && TODAY() >= DATE((Year(TODAY())),5,1) && TODAY() <= DATE((Year(TODAY())),6,30),"2", /*Today or July 1st*/ IF( Renewal__c = TRUE && PreviousRegistrationStatus__c = "Expired" && TODAY() >= DATE((Year(TODAY())),5,1) && TODAY() <= DATE((Year(TODAY())),6,30),"2", /*Today or July 1st*/ IF( Renewal__c = TRUE && PreviousRegistrationStatus__c = "Active" && TODAY() >= DATE((Year(TODAY())),5,1) && TODAY() <= DATE((Year(TODAY())),6,30),"3", /*July 1st Only*/ IF( Renewal__c = TRUE && PreviousRegistrationStatus__c = "Expired" && TODAY() >= DATE((Year(TODAY())),7,1) || TODAY() <= DATE((Year(TODAY())),4,30),"4", null))))) /*Today Only*/
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines if the record is a renewal and which date period it falls in. This determines which Registration Period section the contractor will see in the form.
CustomField.label: SetRegistrationPeriod
